name: qliksensewebsocketconnectivitytester
description: ## Description: This web page can be used to assess websocket connectivity to your Qlik Sense installation.

scripts.dist: npm run build && findstr /RV "<script.src=.*bundle </html>" QlikSenseWebsocketTest.html > q.html && echo ^<script^> >> q.html && type bundle.js >> q.html && echo ^</script^>^</html^> >> q.html && npm run dist:complete

author: Fredrik Lautrup
